          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Infinitiv till imperfekt</string>
            <string language="en">Infinitive to imperfect</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Infinitiv zu unvollständigem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Infinitif à imparfait</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Infinitivo a imperfeito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Infinito ad imperfetto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απαρέμφατο σε ατελή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Infinitivo a imperfecto</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Här tränar vi på att ändra från infinitivformer till imperfekt.Modul 6 - Vad vill du? - Grammatik 6.Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">Here we train to change from infinitivformer to the imperfect. Module 6 - What do you want? - Grammar 6. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>
            <string language="sv">språk</string>

            <string language="en">past</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier bilden wir aus, um vom infinitivformer zum 
unvollständigen zu ändern. Modul 6 - Was wünschen Sie? 
- Grammatik 6. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ici nous nous exerçons pour changer de 
l'infinitivformer en imparfait. Module 6 - Que voulez-vous
? - grammaire 6. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui nós treinamos para mudar do infinitivformer
ao imperfeito. Módulo 6 - Que você quer? - 
gramática 6. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui addestriamo per cambiare da infinitivformer 
all'imperfetto. Modulo 6 - Che cosa desiderate? - 
grammatica 6. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ εκπαιδεύουμε να αλλάξουμε από το 
infinitivformer στον ατελή. Ενότητα 6 - τι θέλετε; -
Γραμματική 6. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí entrenamos para cambiar de infinitivformer 
al imperfecto. Módulo 6 - ¿Qué usted desea? - 
gramática 6. Safir.</string>
          </description>
